name: Minor Reign
description:
Welcome to Minor Reign!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

As a king, there are a lot of decisions to make. Wouldn't it be easier to just say "Yes", "No", or "IDK"? 

Well, now you can!

Live through your reign and control the fates of your subjects by answering their requests...

But be careful!

if someone gets too unhappy, they might start plotting your demise!
